APIUsage: Recurring Billing API methods allow you to manage regular payment subscriptions.

methods.title: Create a Subscription
methods.usage: For subscriptions with a monthly interval, whose payments begin on the 31st of a month, payments for months with less than 31 days will occur on the last day of the month.

children.name: merchantAuthentication
children.value: Merchant account credentials.
children.notes: See Merchant authentication Section.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned ID associated with the customer Profile.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included int he response.

children.name: subscription
children.value: Contains information about the subscription.

children.name: name
children.value: Merchant-assigned name for the subscription.

children.name: paymentSchedule
children.value: Contains information about the payment schedule.

children.name: interval
children.value: Contains information about the time between payments.

children.name: length
children.value: The measurement of time, in association with the Interval Unit, that is used to define the frequency of the billing occurrences.
children.notes: If the Interval Unit is "months", can be any number between one (1) and 12. If the Interval Unit is "days", can be any number between seven (7) and 365.

children.name: unit
children.value: The unit of time, in association with the Interval Length, between each billing occurrence.

children.name: startDate
children.value: The date the subscription begins (also the date the initial billing occurs).
children.notes:
The date entered must be greater than or equal to the date the subscription was created.

The validation checks against local server date, which is Mountain Time. An error might possibly occur if you try to submit a subscription from a time zone where the resulting date is different; for example, if you are in the Pacific time zone and try to submit a subscription between 11:00 PM and midnight, with a start date set for today. 

If the start date is the 31st, and the interval is monthly, the billing date is the last day of each month (even when the month does not have 31 days).

children.name: totalOccurrences
children.value: Number of billing occurrences or payments for the subscription.
children.notes:
To submit a subscription with no end date (an ongoing subscription), this field must be submitted with a value of “9999.”

If a trial period is specified, this number should include the Trial Occurrences.

children.name: trialOccurrences
children.value: Number of billing occurrences or payments int he trial period.
children.notes: If a trial period is specified, this number must be included in the Total Occurences.

children.name: amount
children.value: The amount to be billed to the customer for each payment int he subscription.
children.notes: If a trial period is specified, this is the amount that will be charged after the trial payments are complete.

children.name: trialAmount
children.value: The amount to be charged for each payment during the trial period.
children.notes:
Required when trialOccurrences is specified.

Once the number of trial occurrences is complete, the regular amount will be charged for each remaining payment.

children.name: payment
children.value: Contains either the customer's credit card or bank account payment information.

children.name: creditCard
children.value: Contains the customer's credit card information.
children.notes: Include this element only when the payment method is credit card.

children.name: cardNumber
children.value: The credit card number used for payment of the subscription.

children.name: expirationDate
children.value: The expiration date of the credit card used for the subscription.

children.name: cardCode
children.value: The three or four-digit card code on the back of most credit cards, on the front for American Express.
children.notes: Include this element only when the merchant has set the card code value field to required int he account settings. The value itself is never validated.

children.name: bankAccount
children.value: Contains the customer's bank account information.
children.notes: Include this element only when the payment method is bank account.

children.name: accountType
children.value: The type of account used for payment of the subscription.

children.name: routingNumber
children.value: The routing number of the customer's bank.

children.name: accountNumber
children.value: The bank account number used for payment of the subscription.

children.name: nameonAccount
children.value: The full name of the individual associated with the bank account number.

children.name: echeckType
children.value: The type of electronic check transaction used for the subscription.

children.name: bankName
children.value: The name of the bank associated with the bank account Number.

children.name: order
children.value: Contains optional order information.

children.name: invoiceNumber
children.value: Merchant-assigned invoice number for the subscription.
children.notes: The invoice number will be associated with each payment in the subscription.

children.name: description
children.value: Description of the subscription.
children.notes: The description will be associated with each payment in the subscription.

children.name: customer
children.value: Contains information about the customer.

children.name: id
children.value: Merchant-assigned identifier for the customer.

children.name: email
children.value: The customer's email address.
children.notes: Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: phoneNumber
children.value: The customer's phone number.

children.name: faxNumber
children.value: The customer's fax number.

children.name: billTo
children.value: Contains the customer's billing address information.

children.name: firstName
children.value: The first name associated with the customer's billing address.

children.name: lastName
children.value: The last name associated with the customer's billing address.

children.name: company
children.value: The company associated with the customer's billing address.

children.name: address
children.value: The customer's billing street address.
children.notes: Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: city
children.value: The city of the customer's billing address.
children.notes: Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: state
children.value: The state or province of the customer's billing address.
children.notes: Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: zip
children.value: The ZIP or Postal code of the customer's billing address.
children.notes: Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: country
children.value: The country of the customer's billing address.
children.notes:
Must be valid two-character country code or full country name (in English).

Required when using an EU payment processor.

children.name: shipTo
children.value: Contains the customer's shipping address information.

children.name: firstName
children.value: The first name associated with the customer's shipping address.

children.name: lastName
children.value: The last name associated with the customer's shipping address.

children.name: company
children.value: The company associated with the customer's shipping address.

children.name: address
children.value: The customer's shipping street address.

children.name: city
children.value: The city of the customer's shipping address.

children.name: state
children.value: The state of the customer's shipping address

children.name: zip
children.value: The ZIP code of the customer's shipping address.

children.name: country
children.value: The country of the customer's shipping address.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned reference ID for the request.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included in the response.

children.name: messages
children.value: Contains Information about the results of the request.
children.notes: See response code guide.

children.name: subscriptionId
children.value: The payment gateway assigned identification number for the subscription.

methods.title: Get Subscription Status
methods.usage: Retrieves the status of an existing ARB subscription.

children.name: merchantAuthentication
children.value: Merchant account credentials.
children.notes: See Merchant authentication Section.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned ID associated with the customer Profile.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included int he response.

children.name: subscriptionId
children.value: The payment gateway-assigned identification number for the subscription.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned reference ID for the request.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included in the response.

children.name: messages
children.value: Contains Information about the results of the request.
children.notes: See response code guide.

children.name: status
children.value: Contains information about the subscription status.

methods.title: Update a Subscription
methods.usage: Used to update an existing ARB subscription. Only the subscription ID and fields that you wish to modify need to be submitted.

children.name: merchantAuthentication
children.value: Merchant account credentials.
children.notes: See Merchant authentication Section.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned ID associated with the customer Profile.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included int he response.

children.name: subscriptionId
children.value: The payment gateway-assigned identification number for the subscription.

children.name: subscription
children.value: Contains information about the subscription.

children.name: name
children.value: Merchant-assigned name for hte subscription.

children.name: paymentSchedule
children.value: Contains information about the payment schedule.

children.name: startDate
children.value: The date the subscription begins (also the date the initial billing occurs).
children.notes: The start date can only be updated if no successful payments have been completed.

children.name: totalOccurrences
children.value: Number of billing occurrences or payments for the subscription.
children.notes:
To submit a subscription with no end date (an ongoing subscription), this field must be submitted with a value of “9999.”

If a trial period is specified, this number should include the Trial Occurrences.

children.name: trialOccurrences
children.value: Number of billing occurrences or payments int he trial period.
children.notes: The number of trial occurrences can only be edited if the subscription has not started or is still in the trial period.

children.name: amount
children.value: The amount to be billed to the customer for each payment int he subscription.
children.notes: If a trial period is specified, this is the amount that will be charged after the trial payments are complete.

children.name: trialAmount
children.value: The amount to be charged for each payment during the trial period.
children.notes:
Required when trialOccurrences is specified.

Once the number of trial occurrences is complete, the regular amount will be charged for each remaining payment.

methods.title: Cancel a Subscription
methods.usage: Used to cancel an existing subscription.

children.name: merchantAuthentication
children.value: Merchant account credentials.
children.notes: See Merchant authentication Section.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned ID associated with the customer Profile.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included int he response.

children.name: subscriptionId
children.value: The payment gateway-assigned identification number for the subscription.

children.name: refId
children.value: Merchant-assigned reference ID for the request.
children.notes: If included in the request, this value will be included in the response.

children.name: messages
children.value: Contains Information about the results of the request.
children.notes: See response code guide.
